page.title: 13Holyport Manor School.
page.content: This school is for{children with {special educational needs.}It has 250 pupils who come from the Maidenhead, Slough and Windsor area.They are from 7 years of age but a few are younger and they can stay until 16 or 19.There are 3 parts of the school:the Leavers' department which is in the old Manor House,Poplar House for the children who have reading and writing problems and Oak House for the mentally and physically handicapped children.School begins at 9.15 and finishes at 3.15 but some of the boys are boarders in the hostel.There are about 50 members of staff because the children are taught or helped in very{small groups. The school stands in large grounds and there are two playing fields, lovely lawns and several play areas with lots of equipment.There are 3 pools,one of which is a special{hydrotherapy pool.
